attributes.action: Stop Sir Richard Branson and share holders of virgin media charging £60 per year additional costs for the privalige of paying your bill via other methods than direct debit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Virgin Media charge £60 per year if you dont pay by direct debit.Many customers are not aware of this charge as it is not clear in terms and conditions.
This is clear discrimination against people who do not have access to direct debit.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
